casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
David Edward WILSON. No. 257A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 28, 2007. Mark P. Foster, Jr., Charlotte, for Wilson. Jane A. Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 643 S.E.2d 620 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th day of June 2007 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th day of August 2007."
